MOVE
LEFT
REPORT

PLACE -1,0,WEST
REPORT

PLACE 0,0,SOUTH
REPORT
Output: 0, 0, SOUTH
MOVE
REPORT
Output: 0, 0, SOUTH
LEFT
REPORT
Output: 0, 0, EAST

REPORT

REPORT

RIGHT

REPORT
Output: 2, 0, SOUTH

Output: 2, 0, SOUTH

REPORT

REPORT
